de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation

Class FadeAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.DialogAnimation
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.animation.FadeAnimation

  • public class FadeAnimation
extends DialogAnimation
    An animation, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its alpha property.
    Since:
    4.1.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FadeAnimation.Builder
      A builder, which allows to create animations, which can be used to show or hide a dialog by animating its position and size.

        protected FadeAnimation(@NonNull

        Creates a new animation, which allows to show or hide a dialog by animating its alpha property.
